Class A3DScope

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.Filter
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.multimedia.a3dscope.A3DScope
public class A3DScope extends Filter
This class implements FFmpeg's "a3dscope" multimedia filter.

  • Method Details

    • setRate

      public void setRate(int rate) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This method sets the frame rate for the filter.
      Parameters:
      rate - The given frame rate. This value cannot be less than or equal to zero.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given frame rate is less than or equal to zero

    • setSizeID

      public void setSizeID(@NotNull @NotNull String sizeID) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This method sets the size's ID.
      Parameters:
      sizeID - The given size's ID. This value must be accepted by FFmpeg.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given value is null, an empty string, or it is not accepted by FFmpeg

    • setFOV

      public void setFOV(int fov) throws InvalidArgumentException
      This method sets the field of view.
      Parameters:
      fov - The given field of view. This value must be between 40 and 150 (included).
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given field of view is less than 40 or greater than 150

      InvalidArgumentException - If the camera roll's angle is less than zero

      public void setZoom(int xzoom, int yzoom, int zzoom) throws InvalidArgumentException
